sense.def:
The transmission of something
je pošiljanje ali posredovanje nečesa drugi osebi ali na drug kraj.

The transmission of television or radio programmes
je predvajanje televizijskih ali radijskih oddaj.

seg.quote: ...a unique film record that was destroyed after transmission.

sense.def:
A transmission
je televizijska ali radijska oddaja.

seg.quote: Millions would have heard that transmission.
